The Epic War

The Ancestors: the family which caused the beginning, the end and the battle of the century. Where blood is located, where death takes place, this is the most exciting book that you are ever going to read in your entire life. You will be defeated with the action, the excitement and the heroes from this book. In futuristic Brixton, 2080, in a world where superpowers exist. Two teams: crime fighting heroes and money crazed villains. Both of the teams fight to their deaths, who will win? You are about to find outâ€¦ Take a journey into the book. Created by children, made for children, the best seller in Brixton.
